label.phrase: the post office card account is vital for the future stability of the post office if the government does not award the contract to the post office it could sound the deathknell for the country's network of post offices

clusterList.phrase: the post office card account is vital for the future stability of the post office if the government does not award the contract to the post office it could sound the deathknell for the country's network of post offices
losing the post office card account contract would undermine the sustainability of the post office network and would inevitably lead to the closure of around 3 000 post offices
